messages.subject: Food choices, etc.
messages.msgSnippet: Being new to chat rooms, I m still figuring out how all this works. Wish I knew what all the acronyms were about... Anyway, I wanted to add my 2 cents about
messages.messageBody:
Being new to chat rooms, I'm still figuring out how all this works.
Wish I knew what all the acronyms were about...

Anyway, I wanted to add my 2 cents about food issues. My 12 year-
old son has lived on bagels & creamcheese, pasta & butter (basically
all white food) for 3 years. This year, he grew about 2 inches, and
is developing like a "normal" adolescent. He gets nourishment
(somehow) from what he eats. I know as I let go of my judgment
about his eating habits, he'll relax and try new things. I'm very
grateful for this group and its diverse approaches and suggestions.

By the way, any unschoolers in the northern CA (Chico) area??

Karen
